EXTRACTED VALUE: "A rich and winning comic debut, destined to become a classic."--"Daily Telegraph, "UK
"This book is so powerful that as I finished it I turned to the front to start again."--Andrew James, "Sunday Express"
"A wondrous telling of the history of the very English love affair with gardens and growing things...I have learned so much from this book."
"As scholarly as it is imaginative... fully worthy of its subject." - John Gross, "Sunday Telegraph
